WorkItem.ClosedComment: waiting for more detail on the exception
WorkItem.Description:
I installed the latest version of Snippet Editor yesterday and found that it still won't run on my machine (Win 7 & VS 2008 - vb).  I get the message "Unhandled exception has occurred in your application..." when starting.
 
I looked for fixes to remedy the problem and found only one about the config file entries which did not work.  I can't believe that I am the only one who has the problem and that has existed for over two years and no one has a solution.  Even after I bought Bill McC a beer - no good deed goes unpunished.
 
Appreciate any help. 
Thanks,
Joe

Comments.Message:
Please download the last source code, changeset 36425:
http://snippeteditor.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/36425

Run the application from visual studio and give us more details on the error. It's most likely a registry problem, but can't tell form the detail provided.
